name: Creative Sound BlasterX Katana - Sound bar system wireless - Bluetooth - 75 Watt | Dell USA
description: Named after the sword so technologically perfect in structure and so demanding in its creation, the Sound BlasterX Katana exhibits the same sleek sophistication and formidable strength in its design and audio prowess. In a league of its own, the Katana fits right under your monitor with a slimness that's unmatched by other so-called gaming
